PHRASE.LANG: Norm's maybe my name, being zombie's my game, I like to eat flesh as long as it's fresh, drinking blood through a vein with a penchant for brain... [#Legal]
Le zombie de compagnie normal d'All Zombies Must Die! Ne vous fiez pas à son apparence docile, il n'attend que de vous croquer le bras ! [#Legal]
Der normale All Zombies Must Die!-Zombie-Begleiter. Der Typ mag ja niedlich aussehen, aber wenn du deinen Arm behalten willst, solltest du ihm lieber nicht die Hand reichen. [#Legal]
Il compagno zombi normale di All Zombies Must Die! Questo piccoletto può sembrare tenero, ma se gliene dai la possibilità ti strapperà un braccio a morsi! [#Legal]
El compañero zombi normal de All Zombies Must Die! Este pequeño puede parecer una monada, ¡pero te arrancará el brazo de un mordisco si tiene la oportunidad! [#Legal]
Norm's maybe my name, being zombie's my game, I like to eat flesh as long as it's fresh, drinking blood through a vein with a penchant for brain... [#Legal]
Norm's maybe my name, being zombie's my game, I like to eat flesh as long as it's fresh, drinking blood through a vein with a penchant for brain... [#Legal]
